name: System
desc: An object that affects multiple entities in every frame of a RealityKit scene.

items.name: static var dependencies: [SystemDependency]
items.desc: An array of dependencies for this system.

items.name: enum SystemDependency
items.desc: An object that specifies the update order between multiple systems.

items.name: struct SceneUpdateContext
items.desc: An object that contains information about the scene to update.

items.name: struct EntityQuery
items.desc: An object that retrieves entities from a scene.

items.name: struct QueryPredicate
items.desc: An object that defines the criteria for an entity query.

items.name: struct QueryResult
items.desc: An object that returns the results of an entity query.
